node.name: EVars Eclipse Debug Plugin
node.shortdescription: eVars, short for Enhanced Eclipse Variables View, is a debugging utility plug-in which allows developers to filter, save and reload variables on current stack frame. It also features a concise but powerful OPath expression language similar to XPath for navigating/filtering variables from Variable's view.
node.body: eVars, short for Enhanced Eclipse Variables View, is a debugging utility plug-in which allows developers to filter, save and reload variables on current stack frame. It also features a concise but powerful OPath expression language similar to XPath for navigating/filtering variables from Variable's view.
